p.p: edit-status - Edit xml property files with a gui editor
dist - Build distribution packages wo single build checks
mavendocs - Generates the documentation to the maven lf
site - Makes all the site doco
testmodule - Testing that all major targets work; useful before a commit
testtargets - Testing that all major targets work indipendently; useful before a commit
